name: Apocalive
description:
Apocalive is a casual fun to play third-person zombie shooter developed by a single person. It comes with several game modes and no story mode.

You are alone fighting for your life against zombies in post-apocalyptic environments. The game consists of fast paced horde mode and wave mode in 4 different locations.

Features


  • Collect weapons, find ammo and kill anyone who crosses the line.
  • Throw grenades and shoot at explosive barrels to blast zombie hordes.
  • Use health kits to keep you fit to fight.
  • Use roll, back flip and front flip to swiftly move through the world and avoid zombies from hurting you.
  • Beautiful yet hostile locations to fight zombies.
  • Horde mode.
  • Wave based mode.
  • Realistic graphics with high detailed models and textures.
  • Action packed gameplay with no plots to worry about.
